title: Canadian businessman Michael Spavor sentenced by Chinese court to 11 years in prison for spying
content:
1. Canadian businessman Michael Spavor sentenced by Chinese court to 11 years in prison for spying  CNN
  2. China court upholds Canadian's death sentence  Reuters

  4. China: Canadian citizen loses appeal against death penalty  BBC News

localize.title: カナダ人ビジネスマン、マイケル・スパバー氏が中国の裁判所からスパイ容疑で11年の懲役刑を宣告される
